title: Would Poppy's new W stop things like Rek'Sai ult?
body: So her new W stops dashes, if Rek'Sai was ulting under you, would it rip her out of the ground? Or does Rek R not count as a dash?

replies.body: It's considered a Global Targeted Unit Dash however she becomes untargetable which gives immunity to all status ailments. (Untargetable refers to champions in a state where targeted spells such as Rammus Rammus's Puncturing Taunt.png Puncturing Taunt and LeBlanc LeBlanc's Sigil of Malice.png Sigil of Malice cannot be cast on the untargetable champion, and nontargeted spells such as Karthus Karthus's Requiem.png Requiem will have no effect; an exception being Soraka Soraka's Wish.png Wish. Additionally, they cannot be targeted by auto attacks.).
So long story short the answer is no. I didn't think it would I just reckon it'd be hilarious if it did. Thanks :)
Poppy W probably works the same way veigar E works and I don't think it would stop Reksai ult
